text: Today on the West Coast, conditions are poor with 5 ft @9s NW swell and fresh 18 mph WNW winds. It's a bit blown out, so best to give it a miss. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with similar swell but shifting to 18 mph SW winds; Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay could offer some fun. The day after, swell drops to 4 ft @10s with lighter 15 mph SW winds, making it more workable at spots like Machir Bay. Best: tomorrow.
